advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
** Featured #1 in France, Spain, Brazil and Italy (and that's not a fake!) **
** Over 2 000 000 Fakers in the world! **

Want to impress your friends by appearing on the front cover of famous magazines? Or, give your buddies their own exclusive “License to Score?” Then FAKER$ is the app for you!

MORE THAN 120 FREE TEMPLATES and 450 templates to discover in the shop !

With zero hassle, FAKER$ enables you to:
•Set your own portrait on the faker cover of the world’s most famous magazines and newspapers.
•Create fake badges to join the world most secretive and prestigious organizations. 
•Become a world curling ace, with your own fake diplomas.
•Embed your photo into billboard advertisements.
•Send madcap, traditional, romantic or hilarious greeting and invitations cards.
•Be the star of your own movie poster.

With FAKER$, you can:
•Alter text – FAKER$ is the only app of its kind to do this!
•Embed a photo, taken right then, or selected from your iPhone Camera Roll.
•Zoom in and move the photo around in the selected template (newspapers, magazines, badges, diplomas, etc.).
•Add effects (on iOS5).
•Change text color
•Save and print your creations via Air Print.
•Share your creations via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr or by e-mail to win exclusive templates.
•Purchase new templates from the store.
•Enjoy regular updates with extra templates for the packs you purchased

**** What extras does the Gold version have? ****

Zero adverts – not bad for a start! 
The Gold version offers users the full catalogue to date of FAKER$’ template in every category: newspapers, magazines, badges, diplomas, movie posters, invitations, billboards and greetings cards. More than 550 templates !
New templates are added regularly. Just update the application to get them for free.

**** Faker$ - if you can’t laugh, stay away! ****


----------- USERS REVIEWS ------------
Garydbowers : "Just love this app"
Marth10 : "I love being creative and this is the app for that. Make whatever your hearts desire. The best is you control everything even the text. Get it. Must have"

----------- ACCLAIMED BY OUR TEAM -----------
Laetitia, designer : « I really enjoyed making this app. I trully hope you'll have as much fun using it as I did designing it !"

---------- CONTACT US ----------
For all questions, suggestions or problems contact: contact@heliceum.com
Get the latest news from Heliceum on twitter: @heliceum, or on Facebook www.facebook.com/heliceum.
releaseNotes:
Thank you for using Faker$!

We have fixed the iOS8 bug which prevented photo imports, you will now be able to keep on creating fun and customized photomontage! :-)

Thanks for your loyalty!
